content: Joe Romm is the master of fake news, and has been for years. I have been following Joe for years and it’s always good for a good laugh. I have never known him to say anything positive about the future climate, and he never gives any sort of reasoned rebuttal to any climate conclusion that is not catastrophic. Anything less then 100 percent catastrophic is immediately placed in the “denier” category. Follow him and see for yourself.
